Basketball (College)

lead_paragraph: Coach Jim Boeheim defended the associate head basketball coach Bernie Fine, who was placed on administrative leave after ESPN reported that he molested a team ball boy in the 1980s.
snippet: Coach Jim Boeheim defended the associate head basketball coach Bernie Fine, who was placed on administrative leave after ESPN reported that he molested a team ball boy in the 1980s.
